titles.title: Judicial Officials' Survivor Annuity Enrollment Act of 2003
A bill to provide for a period of open enrollment for judicial officials under section 376 of title 28, United States Code, and for other purposes.
Judicial Officials' Survivor Annuity Enrollment Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Judicial Officials' Survivor Annuity Enrollment Act of 2003 - Amends the Federal judicial code to provide for a six-month period of open enrollment for judicial officials under survivor annuity provisions.
